Container.Name: deepstack-ui
Container.Overview: UI for working with Deepstack. Allows uploading an image and performing object detection with Deepstack. The effect of various parameters can be explored, including filtering the classes of object detected, filtering by minimum confidence, and spatial filtering using a region of interest (ROI). Created by robmarkcole. [br] https://github.com/robmarkcole/deepstack-ui

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: For access to the Web UI. Default is 8501.

Config.Name: Deepstack IP
Config.Description: The IP address of your deepstack instance. Default is localhost. (DEEPSTACK_IP)

Config.Name: Deepstack Port
Config.Description: The PORT of your deepstack instance. Default is 80. (DEEPSTACK_PORT)

Config.Name: Deepstack API Key
Config.Description: The API key of your deepstack instance, if you have set one. (DEEPSTACK_API_KEY)

Config.Name: Deepstack Timeout
Config.Description: The timeout to wait for deepstack. Default is 10 seconds. (DEEPSTACK_TIMEOUT)

Config.Name: Deepstack Custom Model
Config.Description: The name of a custom model, if you wish to use one. (DEEPSTACK_CUSTOM_MODEL)

Container.Description:
UI for working with Deepstack. Allows uploading an image and performing object detection with Deepstack. The effect of various parameters can be explored, including filtering the classes of object detected, filtering by minimum confidence, and spatial filtering using a region of interest (ROI). Created by robmarkcole.
https://github.com/robmarkcole/deepstack-ui
